short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need to make a decision? Gather web pages and rank them according to the criteria you specify at The Decision Wall.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to surf the web and quickly grab snapshots of websites or products that you are evaluating to make a decision. With a couple of clicks you can gather many different page snapshots into a central Decision Wall and then rank these choices according to the criteria that you specify.

 - Quickly gather page snapshots of products or websites.
 - Rank according to the criteria you specify
 - Make decisions quickly and easily

Free for two active decisions and two reviewers, a small charge applies if you want to have more than two active decisions or reviewers. Requires sign-up at www.the-decision-wall.com.
